stimulusHtml: A uniform magnetic field of magnitude B directed to the right exists in a certain region of space, as shown. A loop of wire is placed in the field such that a vector normal to the plane of the loop is at a 30Â° angle relative to the field. Which of the following is a correct statement about the direction of the current induced in the loop?
choicesHtml: The current starts clockwise and then becomes counterclockwise.
The current starts counterclockwise and then becomes clockwise.
No current will be induced in the loop.
